Package com.bhoffpauir.blisp.lib

Class BooleanAtom

java.lang.Object
com.bhoffpauir.blisp.lib.Atom<Boolean>
com.bhoffpauir.blisp.lib.BooleanAtom
public class BooleanAtom extends Atom<Boolean>
Represents a Boolean atom in blisp. This class extends the Atom class and handles Boolean values.

  • Field Summary

      public boolean equals(Object obj)
      Checks if this Boolean atom is equal to another object.
      Overrides:
      equals in class Object
      Parameters:
      obj - The object to compare with this Boolean atom.
      Returns:

    • getRegexPattern

      public Pattern getRegexPattern()
      Returns a regular expression Pattern that matches valid Boolean values.
      Specified by:
      getRegexPattern in class Atom<Boolean>
      Returns:
      A regex pattern for validating Boolean values, which matches "true" or "false".

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Provides a string representation of this Boolean atom. The format may vary depending on the extendedPrint flag.
      Specified by:
      toString in class Atom<Boolean>
      Returns:
      The string representation of this Boolean atom, prefixed with "Boolean: " if extended printing is enabled.
